alert.note: Alert for Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 9:58PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nicholas, southeastern Kanawha, southwestern Clay and northwestern Fayette Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 958 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burnwell, or 15 miles west of Fayetteville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Burnwell, Powellton, Handley, Bentree, Leewood, Swiss, and Eskdale. This includes West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 67 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas
